(03/21) Full and Archived Stories Home  : People  : Research  : Publications  : Teaching  : Contact Us Welcome The Ultra Low Power IC Research Lab is located at VLSI and Embedded Research Centre at DA-IICT in Gandhinagar, Gujarat, India. We are focused on developing novel low power and low voltage digital and mixed-signal integrated			circuits for next generation IoT and energy harvesting applications.
